sentences.english: However, after the death of Zhang Juzheng, the emperor began to neglect state affairs.
sentences.chinese: 然而，张居正死后，明神宗开始荒废朝政。

sentences.english: Zhang Ju -zhang was an outstanding politician in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 张居正是明朝一位杰出的政治家。

sentences.english: Zhang Juzheng is a historical novel which pursuits the "reality of culture".
sentences.chinese: 《张居正》是一部追求“文化真实”的历史小说。
